# formIntersection(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the primitive to the intersection of itself and the specified primitive.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func formIntersection(_ other: Self)
```

## Parameters

- **other**: The second primitive.
title: formIntersection(_:)
